synopsis.text: Insufficient Direction, the first essay manga turned anime, offers a delightful and heartwarming glimpse into the everyday life of renowned mangaka Moyoco Anno, affectionately known as the 'queen of the manga world.' As she navigates the unique challenges of being married to Hideaki Anno, the acclaimed creator of Evangelion and 'founder of the otaku cult,' Moyoco shares her comedic and relatable experiences as an 'ota-wife.' Join this dynamic duo as they embrace their shared love for all things otaku, showcasing the lighter side of being part of Japan's passionate otaku culture.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
